services.title: Professional BIM Training (Individuals & Corporate)
services.description: Customized BIM training programs designed for engineers, companies, and project teams, focusing on real-world workflows rather than theory. Training covers Revit Structure & Architecture, BIM coordination, clash detection, and ISO 19650 implementation, with practical project-based exercises.

services.title: BIM Coordination & Clash Detection
services.description: Comprehensive multidisciplinary BIM coordination services to identify and resolve clashes between structural, architectural, and MEP systems using Navisworks. Ensuring constructible models, reduced site conflicts, and compliance with ISO 19650 and BIM Execution Plans (BEP).

services.title: AutoCAD to Revit Conversion (Structural & Architectural)
services.description: Accurate conversion of 2D AutoCAD drawings into fully coordinated Revit BIM models, ensuring correct geometry, levels, families, and model structure. Models are delivered based on agreed LOD (300 / 400) and ready for coordination, quantity takeoffs, and shop drawings

services.title: Infrastructure BIM Modeling (Roads & Utility Networks)
services.description: Development of accurate and coordinated BIM models for infrastructure projects, including roads, water supply networks, sanitary and wastewater systems, lift stations, and treatment facilities. Models are created to support multidisciplinary coordination, quantity takeoffs, and constructible design delivery in accordance with project standards, LOD requirements, and BIM Execution Plans (BEP).

services.title: Structural Shop Drawings (Concrete & Rebar)
services.description: Preparation of detailed structural shop drawings for reinforced concrete and rebar works, extracted directly from accurate BIM models. Drawings comply with project specifications and site execution requirements, reducing errors and rework.

services.title: Structural Quantity Takeoffs & BOQs
services.description: Precise structural quantity takeoffs generated from BIM models to support cost estimation, tendering, and project control. Quantities are verified, structured, and aligned with project BOQs to ensure transparency and accuracy.
